name: Rapid Custom Post Types
author: Logan Henson

sections.installation:
1.Upload:
Unzip RCPT.zip file, and upload all files to your wordpress folder: /wp-content/plugins/RCPT

2.Activate:
In the admin panel, find Plugins->Plugins,click it, active RCPT.

3.Use:

You will need to edit the custom_post_types.php file at the top with arrays describing your custom post types.
The admin panel us still under development.
sections.changelog: v1.1 – Added wordpress color picker as custom field type
sections.description: Easy way to add custom post types without having to recreate all the boilerplate meta code.

short_description: Easy way to add custom post types without having to recreate all the boilerplate meta code.
description: Easy way to add custom post types without having to recreate all the boilerplate meta code.
